thread.title: Karisma Kapoor’s estranged spouse to wed long-term sweetheart?
thread.title_full: Karisma Kapoor’s estranged spouse to wed long-term sweetheart?

author: CanIndia News Service 1
title: Karisma Kapoor’s estranged spouse to wed long-term sweetheart?
text:
0 0 0 0 0 
Mumbai, October 8 (CINEWS): As per a Mumbai Mirror report, Sunjay Kapur – the repelled spouse of performing artist Karisma Kapoor, is supposed to be tying the marital knot with his long-term sweetheart, NY hotelier Vikram Chatwal’s previous wife, Priya Sachdev. 
Sanjay, an industry scion, and Priya, a fashion entrepreneur, have been together for a couple of years yet have asserted to be just friends . Just their internal circle has been aware of their closeness. In any case, the two have been much more open about their relationship in the course of recent months. Sanjay, who had lost his dad a couple of months back, is yet to conclude his separation terms with Karisma. But the report asserts that the insiders from the family court have uncovered that their next hearing is on November 25, and if the two sign on their mutually agreed upon assent terms, they will be authoritatively separated that day.
